name: Malala Yousafzai
quote: One child, one teacher, one book, and one pen can change the world.

name: Michelle Obama
quote: Success isn't about how much money you make; it's about the difference you make in people's lives.

name: Sheryl Sandberg
quote: Leadership is about making others better as a result of your presence.

name: Kamala Harris
quote: My mother would tell me—Kamala, you may be the first to do many things, but make sure you’re not the last.

name: Angela Merkel
quote: Look at the world—there is always something you can do.

name: Serena Williams
quote: Every woman's success should be an inspiration to another. We’re strongest when we cheer each other on.

name: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.

name: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared; it is only to be understood.

name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
quote: Fight for the things that you care about, but do it in a way that will lead others to join you.

name: Greta Thunberg
quote: You are never too small to make a difference.

name: Jacinda Ardern
field: Former Prime Minister of New Zealand
quote: One of the criticisms I’ve faced is that I’m not aggressive or assertive enough, but we need to change that.

name: Indira Gandhi
quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.

name: Katherine Johnson
quote: Girls are capable of doing everything men are capable of doing.

name: Ava DuVernay
quote: If your dream only includes you, it's too small.

name: Melinda Gates
quote: A woman with a voice is by definition a strong woman.

name: Emma Watson
quote: If not me, who? If not now, when?

name: Wangari Maathai
quote: It's the little things citizens do. That's what will make the difference.

name: Maya Angelou
quote: Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.

name: Malcolm X’s Mother - Louise Little
quote: A person who stands for nothing will fall for anything.

name: Hellen Keller
quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

name: Coco Chanel
quote: A girl should be two things: who and what she wants.
